attributes.action: cap the level of expensives MP's can claim to between 40-50,000 a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's expensives need to better control with levels of 40,000 to 180,000 being claimed in 1 year with a total of 87.5 million being claim out of tax payers money. This money could go to better places to be used. I believe the goverment should Cap the amount that can be claimed by MP's to between 40-50,000 a year

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
